article_title: Here is Alex Jones wearing a top hat and lizard mask while screaming about Obamacare, just because
article_text:
Normally, I am not really one to listen to Alex Jones. You know, because he’s crazy and all. However, I am often accused of being “biased”– which is, of course, a very unusual thing for a blogger or opinion columnist to be– so I figure it’s fair to let the right explain, in their own special way, just how they feel about the Affordable Care Act.

OH, ok. Now I see the logic! It all makes sense now!

og.title: Here is Alex Jones wearing a top hat and lizard mask while screaming about Obamacare, just because

article_summary:
Normally, I am not really one to listen to Alex Jones.
It all makes sense now!
OH, ok. Now I see the logic!
You know, because he’s crazy and all.
However, I am often accused of being “biased”– which is, of course, a very unusual thing for a blogger or opinion columnist to be– so I figure it’s fair to let the right explain, in their own special way, just how they feel about the Affordable Care Act.
